title: Wrong Value on Armor per-level Seals and Magicresist per-level Glyphs

embed.title: WrongRunesValue
embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hey Guys,

I just discovered that 9 Types of Armor per Level Seals or Magicresist per Level Glyphs, which has a Value of 0.16 each Level, provides "27" Armor/Magicresist at Level 18 instead of "26".

Maths:

0,16 x  9  =   1,44     | Because 9 Seals or 9 Glyhps
1,44 x 18 =  25,92!  | Because 18 Levels.
 
This would be a Value of 26. 

Have a nice day,
OwerLord0fD00m69 ( and yeah, i was drunk as i set up my Summoner Name.. Sry for that)
Here is a Manly-Brofist {{item:1051}}
